com.safenetinc.luna.provider.param

Class LunaParametersGcm

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.security.AlgorithmParametersSpi
      • com.safenetinc.luna.provider.param.LunaParametersGcm

  • public class LunaParametersGcm
extends java.security.AlgorithmParametersSpi
    An algorithm parameters engine class for AES GCM parameters

    • Constructor Detail

      • LunaParametersGcm

        public LunaParametersGcm()
        This constructor is typically used by the JCE provider. The data will be filled in later.

      • LunaParametersGcm

        public LunaParametersGcm(byte[] iv,
                 byte[] aad,
                 int tagBits)
        Constructor for use when creating an instance directly.
        Parameters:
        iv - Initialization vector
        aad - Additional authentication data
        tagBits - The number of authentication bits

    • Method Detail

      • engineGetEncoded

        protected byte[] engineGetEncoded()
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Returns the GCM parameters encoded in a proprietary format. We don't support ASN.1 at this time.
        Specified by:

        Returns:
        Encoded representation of the GCM parameters

        java.io.IOException

                           throws java.io.IOException
        Returns the GCM parameters encoded in a proprietary format. We don't support ASN.1 at this time.
        Specified by:
        engineGetEncoded in class java.security.AlgorithmParametersSpi
        Parameters:
        format - Only "Luna" is supported
        Returns:
        Encoded representation of the GCM parameters
